text:
@HillaryClinton Elect a virus, expect death and destruction. 

— U.S. death toll tops 75,000.
— Unemployment rate skyrockets to 14.7%.
— Former homeland security adviser warns of "red flags" in more rural communities.
— Drug makers say coronavirus vaccine is at least a year from approval. https://t.co/waD93DPAnX
